scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of issues of the University Update (1987-2006) as well as its predecessor publications, the University News (1978-1986), the Tower Tribune (1970-1977) and the Campus Courier (1966-1969) and Update, a weekly newspaper from the University Relations Office, spanning the years 1978 to 2002.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: UAlbany has produced a number of different publications throughout its history targeted at members of the faculty. From 1952 to 2006, the Office of University Relations and its predecessors produced a series of publications aimed at keeping members of the faculty informed of campus events, university news, outside press coverage of the University, and faculty activities and publications. While these publications went by different titles over the years, the universityâ€™s faculty and staff were always the primary audience.

The Faculty Bulletin of Information (FBI) was a weekly general interest newsletter of campus and faculty activity published by Elmer Matthews of the Placement Office until 1964 November. After this date publication was taken over by the Public Relations Office. The FBI was succeeded by Campus Courier (1966-1969). Following the Campus Courier were the Tower Tribune, the University News, and the University Update. The University Update appears to have ceased publication in May of 2006.
